replies.txt_content:
推荐音乐【Gregorian】专辑：

Engel - Gregorian
Lucifer - Gregorian
Moment of Peace - Gregorian
Scarborough Fair - Gregorian
The Sound Of Silence - Gregorian

个人比较喜欢这类的
